text: Brenles was a municipality of the district Broye-Vully, in the canton of Vaud in Switzerland. On 1 January 2017, the former municipalities of Brenles, Chesalles-sur-Moudon, Cremin, Forel-sur-Lucens and Sarzens joined together to become the municipality of Lucens.Amtliches Gemeindeverzeichnis der Schweiz accessed 10 January 2017 == References == ==Other websites== Category:Former municipalities of Vaud
title: Brenles
